          <title>
            <string language="sl">Seštevanje - detektiv (Lažja)</string>
            <string language="en">Addition - detective (easy)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hinzufügung - Detektiv (einfach)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ajout - détective (facile)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Adição - detetive (fácil)</string>

          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Lahkotnejša naloga iz seštevanja - poišči pravo pot skozi tabelo.</string>
            <string language="en">Easy exercises in addition - find the right path through the table.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="sl">seštevanje</string>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Des exercices faciles en outre - trouvez la voie

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Exercícios fáceis além - encontre o trajeto

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-it">Esercitazioni facili in più - trovi il percorso

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εύκολες ασκήσεις επιπλέον - βρείτε το σωστό μονοπάτι
μέσω του πίνακα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los ejercicios fáciles además - encuentre el 
camino derecho a través del vector.</string>
